/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the asphalt below. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. People can be seen strolling leisurely on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding to the overall tranquility of the scene. The image is a beautiful representation of everyday life in Beijing, capturing the harmony between nature and urban living.
